mapper.select: SELECT p.*, COUNT(r.prod_rev_no) as review_count FROM product p LEFT JOIN prod_review r ON p.prod_no = r.prod_no WHERE p.prod_delete_yn = 'N' GROUP BY p.prod_no ORDER BY review_count DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT p.*, AVG(r.prod_rev_star) as average_rating FROM product p LEFT JOIN prod_review r ON p.prod_no = r.prod_no WHERE p.prod_delete_yn = 'N' GROUP BY p.prod_no ORDER BY average_rating DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM product WHERE prod_delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY prod_update_at DESC LIMIT 4
